arguments.template:
<app-drawer [overrideProperties]="invisibleStyle"  [hoverClass]="'clickable'"></app-drawer>

    <svg *ngIf="cssBounds" [ngStyle]="cssBounds"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      <svg:g [attr.transform]="selectionTransform">
        <ng-container *ngFor="let s of (elementState | async)?.present.selectedObjects">
          <ng-container dynamic-svg [componentData]="s" [overrideProperties]="selectionStyle" (click)="onClick($event)"></ng-container>
        </ng-container>
        <ng-container 
          *ngIf="(elementState | async)?.present.selectedBounds && boundingBoxObject" dynamic-svg 
          [componentData]="boundingBoxObject"
          [hoverClass]="'clickable'" 

          (mouseDown)="onMouseDown($event)"
          (mouseMove)="onMouseMove($event)"
          (mouseUp)="onMouseUp($event)"

          ></ng-container>
      </svg:g>
    </svg>
